Name: dextro-looped transposition of the great arteries
Definition: A congenital heart disease characterized by complete inversion of the great vessels where the aorta incorrectly arises from the right ventricle and the pulmonary artery incorrectly arises from the left ventricle.

Name: hypoplastic right heart syndrome
Definition: A congenital heart disease characterized by underdevelopment of the structures on the right side of the heart commonly associated with atrial septal defect.

Name: patent ductus arteriosus
Definition: A skin disease located_in the sweat glands.

Name: obsolete convergence excess or spasm
Definition: A skin disease located_in the sweat glands.

Name: heart septal defect
Definition: A bladder disease that is characterized by inflammation of the bladder.

Name: scimitar syndrome
Definition: A female reproductive system disease that is characterized by the occlusion of some part of the female genital tract

Name: obsolete respiratory system abnormality
Definition: A female reproductive system disease that is characterized by the occlusion of some part of the female genital tract

Name: tetralogy of Fallot
Definition: An ovarian carcinoma that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells and derives_from epithelial cells.
Synonym: Ventricular septal defect with pulmonary stenosis or atresia

Name: obsolete demyelinating encephalopathy
Definition: An ovarian carcinoma that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells and derives_from epithelial cells.
Synonym: Ventricular septal defect with pulmonary stenosis or atresia

Name: dextrocardia
Definition: A bronchial disease that is a chronic inflammatory condition of one or more bronchi or bronchioles marked by dilatation and loss of elasticity of the walls resulting from damage to the airway wall leading to the formation of small sacs on the bronchial wall and impairment of cilia mobility in the lung. Inflammation of the bronchial wall increases mucus secretion which serves as a breeding ground for bacteria. Bronchiectasis is caused by repeated respiratory infections

Name: hypoplastic left heart syndrome
Definition: A congenital heart disease characterized by abnormal development of the left-sided structures of the heart.
